translation.en: Let me see your other hand.
If I move this hand, I'm afraid my stomach will fall out.
translation.fr:
Si je la bouge,
mes boyaux risquent de se barrer.

translation.en: I need to see your other hand.

translation.fr:
- T'as quoi dans la main ?
- Rien.

translation.en: I miss the Cassie I was.
translation.fr: Elle me manque, la Cassie que j'étais.

translation.en: A totally normal high school girl.
I wonder what that Cassie would think of me now.
translation.fr:
Qu'est-ce qu'elle penserait
de celle d'aujourd'hui ?

translation.en: You know, he was supposed to be here.
Why are the hot ones always so unreliable?
translation.fr: Les plus canon, ils sont pas fiables.

translation.en: What would I even say to him?
I don't know him, and he doesn't even know me.
translation.fr: Je le connais pas, il me connaît pas.

translation.en: You're a girl. He's a boy.
translation.fr: T'es une fille, c'est un mec.

translation.en: What? You have something against pink?
No, no. I totally like it.
This is actually my sister's phone.
translation.fr:
C'est celui de ma sœur.
Je l'ai déposée chez une copine,

translation.en: I dropped her off at a sleepover, and she took mine by mistake.
translation.fr:
C'est celui de ma sœur.
Je l'ai déposée chez une copine, elle a pris mon téléphone.
Je ne le savais pas encore,

translation.en: but that was the last normal day of my life.
translation.fr:
mais c'était le dernier
jour normal de ma vie.

translation.en: When you're in high school, just about everything feels like the end of the world.
translation.fr:
Quand on est au lycée,
on vit tout comme la fin du monde.

translation.en: An early curfew, a final exam...
What are we doing out here? Why not just tell her where you're gonna kick it?
translation.fr:
C'est quoi, ça ?
Dis-lui où tu vas tirer, aussi.

translation.en: Hey, check it out. Look at this. It's so freaky.
That's it. You're done. Off the field.
No. But, look, it's really weird.
what we thought was the end of the world
translation.fr: on croyait que c'était la fin du monde...

translation.en: What, did someone famous die or something?
It appears to be metallic and of a considerable size.
Across the world, social media has been awash with panic and speculation
translation.fr:
Les réseaux sociaux
sont pris de panique et s'interrogent

translation.en: as these images spread like wildfire.
translation.fr: alors que ces images se répandent.

translation.en: The president has authorized NASA to attempt communication with the object
translation.fr:
Le Président a autorisé la Nasa
à contacter l'objet,

translation.en: BREAKING NEWS MESSAGE FROM THE WHITE HOUSE that is now circling our planet
and is currently over the United States, moving west over Ohio.
translation.fr:
et se déplace au-dessus des États-Unis,
vers l'ouest, par l'Ohio.

translation.en: Oh, my God. It's right over us.
There were no messages from our galactic party crashers during the first ten days.
translation.fr:
Aucun signe de nos squatteurs galactiques,
les dix premiers jours.

translation.en: But pretty soon, they had a name.
translation.fr: Mais très vite, on leur a donné un nom.

translation.en: They say they don't feel safe so close to the city.
translation.fr: Ils se sentent pas en sécurité.

translation.en: Lizbeth: Guess who's sitting right behind me...
translation.fr: Devine qui est assis derrière moi...

translation.en: Everybody look at the equation on the board.
will tell him yr avail for end-of-world sex
translation.fr:
Je lui dis que t'es ok
pour la baise de la fin du monde

translation.en: Who can give me the derivative of X?
translation.fr: Quelle est la dérivée de x ?

translation.en: I'm sure this is just a power outage.
The Others hit us with an electromagnetic pulse that killed all the power on the planet.
translation.fr:
L'impulsion électromagnétique des Autres
a coupé toute forme d'énergie électrique.

translation.en: No more everything we took for granted.
translation.fr:
Terminé, tout ce qui nous
paraissait évident.

translation.en: That was the last time I saw Ben Parish.
translation.fr:
C'est la dernière fois
que j'ai vu Ben Parish.

translation.en: Like everyone else in that room.
translation.fr: Comme tous ceux qui étaient là.

translation.en: Here, Sam. Grab me another, okay? Thank you.
At the time, we thought that was it.
translation.fr: On pensait que ça s'arrêterait là.

translation.en: Come on, Sam. It's an earthquake!
Just keep your head down, okay?
In Ohio, we only had the lake to worry about.
translation.fr:
Dans l'Ohio,
y a que le Lac qui posait problème.

translation.en: There are over 300 billion birds in the world.
translation.fr:
Il y a plus de 300 milliards d'oiseaux,
dans le monde.

translation.en: Mom said the avian flu was already one of the world's deadliest viruses.
translation.fr:
La grippe aviaire était déjà l'un
des virus les plus mortels.

translation.en: In the 3rd Wave, the Others modified it.
translation.fr:
Avec la 3e Vague,
les Autres l'ont modifiée.

translation.en: And the birds spread it across the planet.
translation.fr:
Et les oiseaux l'ont propagée
dans le monde entier.

translation.en: -It's okay. I didn't even touch her. -It is not okay. You can't be here.
translation.fr:
- Je l'ai pas touchée.
- Il ne faut pas rester là.

translation.en: Sweetheart, I need you to go home and look after Sammy, okay?
translation.fr: Ma chérie, rentre t'occuper de Sammy.

translation.en: But, Mom, I wanna help you here.
-I know. Can you get her out of here now? -I wanna help.
translation.fr:
- Je veux t'aider.
- Je sais. Faites-la sortir d'ici.

translation.en: Miss, you gotta leave. Let's go.
Some people were immune to the virus.
translation.fr:
Certains étaient
immunisés contre le virus.

translation.en: And a few people got sick and somehow recovered.
translation.fr:
D'autres sont tombés malades
et ont réussi à s'en remettre.

translation.en: Why don't they just get it over with?
translation.fr:
Qu'ils en finissent,
une fois pour toutes.

translation.en: I think a better question is, "What do they need?"
translation.fr:
C'est surtout :
"De quoi ils ont besoin ?"

translation.en: They've been very careful so far
not to damage it any more than absolutely necessary.
translation.fr: à ne pas l'abîmer plus qu'il ne faut.

translation.en: I think that's why they're here, Cassie.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça qu'ils sont là, Cassie.
Ils ont besoin de la Terre.

translation.en: Ready to walk for a while, Sammy?
translation.fr: Prêt à marcher un peu, Sammy ?

translation.en: Dad, how far is it to the refugee camp?
translation.fr: Il est loin, le camp de réfugiés ?

translation.en: Just a few miles. We should be there by nightfall.
translation.fr:
À quelques kilomètres.
On devrait y être en début de soirée.

translation.en: -Dad, look. Is this it? -Yeah, buddy. I think so.
translation.fr: C'est là, papa ? Oui, je crois bien.

translation.en: Latrines are off to the left.
translation.fr: Les latrines sont là-bas, à gauche.

translation.en: How many people are there here?
I don't know how many we got now.
When's the last time you had a hot meal?
This button changes out the clip.
You're gonna carry this with you at all times,
you're not gonna tell anybody you have it,
translation.fr: tu ne dis pas que tu l'as

translation.en: and you're only gonna use it if it's life or death. You got it?
translation.fr:
et tu ne l'utilises
que si tu es en danger de mort.

translation.en: I thought we were safe here.
translation.fr: On n'est pas en sécurité, ici ?
On n'est plus en sécurité nulle part.

translation.en: What is that? I don't know. Come on.
-What's going on? -All right, just take it easy.
translation.fr:
- Qu'est-ce qui se passe ?
- Restez calmes.

translation.en: I thought the cars didn't work.
Ladies and gentlemen, I am Colonel Vosch of the United States Army.
translation.fr:
Je suis le colonel Vosch,
de l'armée américaine.

translation.en: My men and I are from the Wright-Patterson Air Force Base.
translation.fr:
Nous venons de la base aérienne
Wright-Patterson.

translation.en: Let's get you people out of here.
We should be ready to go at a moment's notice, all right? Stay with your sister, Sam.
translation.fr:
On doit être prêts à partir.
Reste avec ta sœur, Sam.

translation.en: Adults, please move to the mess hall for a briefing.
translation.fr:
Les adultes,
rendez-vous au mess pour un briefing.

translation.en: Children, please move to the buses for transport.
translation.fr:
Les enfants,
rejoignez les bus pour le départ.

translation.en: Adults, please move to the mess hall for a briefing.
translation.fr:
Les adultes,
rendez-vous au mess pour un briefing.

translation.en: Do you think they have electricity if the trucks are working?
I don't know. Why, you still have a phone?
translation.fr:
Je sais pas.
T'as toujours un téléphone ?

translation.en: -You have a charger? -Of course, yeah. -Sir, sir. -Yeah?
My orders are to get just the kids onto the bus.
translation.fr:
J'ai ordre de n'embarquer
que les enfants.

translation.en: Well, those might be your orders, but they're my kids.
translation.fr: Peut-être, mais ce sont mes enfants.

translation.en: -We'll wait for another bus. -It's okay, Private.
Look, you're welcome to keep 'em here with you if you want,
translation.fr:
Vous pouvez les garder ici
si vous voulez,

translation.en: but if they were my kids, I'd get 'em on that bus.
translation.fr: mais ils devraient prendre le bus.

translation.en: We have reason to believe there's an imminent threat to this location.
translation.fr:
Une menace imminente
plane sur cet endroit.

translation.en: We're trying to get everyone to safety as quickly as we can,
translation.fr: On veut évacuer tout le monde.

translation.en: and this is the only working transport we've got, so we're taking shifts based on need.
translation.fr:
On n'a que ces véhicules,
on établit des priorités.

translation.en: Kids first, then we come back for the rest of ya.
Well, how safe is it at Wright-Patterson?
Safest place there is right now.
And the buses will just come right back? Dad, no.
translation.fr:
- Les bus reviennent tout de suite ?
- Papa, arrête.

translation.en: Like I said, it's your call.
Just 'cause some man in uniform tries to tell us what to do doesn't mean we actually have to follow his orders.
translation.fr:
C'est pas parce qu'il est en uniforme
qu'on doit lui obéir.

translation.en: Okay, I want you on this one, all right? -I'll be right behind you. -We can't split up.
translation.fr:
- Prenez celui-là.
- On se sépare pas.

translation.en: And we're gonna have dinner tonight. We're going to the same place.
translation.fr:
On se retrouve ce soir. - On va au même endroit.
- Papa, arrête.

translation.en: It's the Army, okay? This is our Army. It's fine. It's gonna be okay.
translation.fr: C'est notre armée, ça va aller.

translation.en: -Don't leave me alone. -All right. Come here.
Take care of your brother. All right? Come here.
I want you to listen to your sister, all right? -Okay. -She's in charge. -Okay? -Dad.
translation.fr: Écoute ta sœur, c'est elle qui commande.

translation.en: I'll be there before you know it.
Here, head to the back, Sam.
-Come here. Give me your backpack. -Bear! -What? -Cassie, I forgot Bear!
-I forgot Bear! I need to go get him! -Sam, stop. Sit down.
-It's okay. What's up? -I can't. I can't go without him.
translation.fr:
- Je vais chercher Nounours !
- Quoi ? Je peux pas partir sans lui.

translation.en: All right, all right, all right. I'll go get him, okay?
Yeah, I'll be right back. I promise.
Bear, Bear, Bear. Bear, Bear, Bear, Bear.
Can I have your attention, please?
If you'll all just quiet down.
We believe the 4th Wave has begun.
translation.fr: Nous pensons que la 4e Vague a commencé.

translation.en: The Others have come down off their ship.
translation.fr:
Les Autres
ont débarqué de leur vaisseau.

translation.en: Apparently, they have the ability to inhabit human hosts
translation.fr:
Ils ont la capacité
d'occuper le corps d'un hôte humain

- Ils ont une apparence humaine ?
- Oui.

translation.en: What we do know is they have snipers in these woods,
translation.fr: Ils ont des snipers dans les bois

translation.en: We've got intel that would suggest some of them could be right here in this very camp.
translation.fr:
Nos renseignements suggèrent
que certains pourraient être ici.

translation.en: So, what... Are you saying that some of us are Others?
translation.fr:
Quoi ? Certains d'entre nous
sont des Autres ?

translation.en: Please. There's a lot we still don't know. We can detect them in children.
translation.fr:
Nous ignorons encore beaucoup de choses.
On les détecte chez les enfants

translation.en: Unfortunately, the screening procedure for adults is a bit more complicated.
translation.fr:
mais le dépistage des adultes
est plus compliqué.

translation.en: I know. I know you all wanna get back to your families.
translation.fr:
Je sais,
vous voulez retrouver votre famille.

translation.en: Unfortunately, we're gonna have to move you all to a secure holding facility
translation.fr:
Nous devons hélas vous placer
en centre de détention

translation.en: so they can run some screening protocols.
translation.fr: afin de procéder à un dépistage.

translation.en: You need to understand, there is no way to differentiate us from the Others
translation.fr:
Comprenez bien qu'il n'y a aucun moyen de nous distinguer des Autres
sans dépistage complet.

de nous distinguer des Autres
sans dépistage complet.

translation.en: The sooner we get you screened, the sooner we can get you back to your families.
translation.fr:
Plus tôt vous serez dépistés,
plus tôt vous serez réunis.

translation.en: I am not an Other, okay? I'm not going anywhere.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas un Autre. J'y vais pas.

translation.en: Sir, no one's saying that you are.
Let me out of here. Get out of my way. Watch out.
-I wanna see my kids! -Put it down!
Stand in the red circle. Wait for your number to be called.
translation.fr:
Attendez dans le cercle rouge
d'être appelés.

translation.en: Stand in the red circle. Wait for your number to be called.
translation.fr:
Attendez dans le cercle rouge
d'être appelés.

translation.en: Stand in the red circle. Wait for your number to be called.
translation.fr:
Attendez dans le cercle rouge
d'être appelés.

translation.en: Any family not known to be dead?
translation.fr: De la famille encore en vie ?
Ma sœur est morte dans les séismes.

translation.en: Mom and Dad killed by the virus.
translation.fr:
Ma mère et mon père
ont été tués par le virus.

translation.en: But it didn't kill you, did it?
That where the nickname came from?

translation.fr: Oui, tu as de la chance.

translation.en: You get to help avenge her death.
translation.fr: Tu vas pouvoir venger sa mort.

translation.en: This puts out a signal that we can track.
translation.fr:
Ça envoie un signal
qu'on peut suivre.

translation.en: You kids are the most important thing right now.
translation.fr:
Vous, les jeunes,
êtes ce qu'il y a de plus important, en ce moment.

translation.en: We need every one of you to help us fight the Others.
translation.fr:
Vous devez tous nous aider
à combattre les Autres.
C'est pas une colonie de vacances.

translation.en: So we don't wanna lose you. Stand up.
translation.fr:
Alors, on veut pas te perdre.
Lève-toi.

translation.en: How are we supposed to fight the Others if we don't even know what they are?
translation.fr:
Comment on combat les Autres
sans savoir qui c'est ?

translation.en: He won't be able to see us.
Take over their minds, their bodies.
translation.fr:
Ils prennent possession
de leur esprit, leur corps.
Traitements, radiations, chirurgie... rien ne marche.

translation.en: The only way to kill 'em is to kill the host.
translation.fr: Pour les tuer, il faut tuer l'hôte.

translation.en: You just need to destroy the thing inside him.
translation.fr: Il faut détruire la chose qui l'habite.
La chose qui a fait ça.

translation.en: If you're gonna be on my squad,
translation.fr:
Pour que tu sois dans mon escouade,
je dois savoir

translation.en: I need to know that you will do whatever it takes to...
translation.fr:
Pour que tu sois dans mon escouade,
je dois savoir que tu es prêt à tout pour...

translation.en: Here's how you kill off a species.
translation.fr: Voici comment on extermine une espèce.

translation.en: First, you take out the easy ones, the weak, the exposed.
translation.fr: D'abord, on supprime les plus faciles, les faibles, les exposés.

translation.en: Kill them as efficiently as possible.
translation.fr: On les tue aussi vite que possible.

translation.en: That was the first three Waves.
translation.fr: Ça, c'étaient les trois premières Vagues.

translation.en: But even if you bug bomb a house, there's always a few cockroaches left.
translation.fr:
Mais même quand on traite une maison,
il reste quelques cafards.

translation.en: Now, we are like those cockroaches.
And the Others are picking us off.
And because the Others look like us,
translation.fr: Et puisque les Autres nous ressemblent,
on ne peut faire confiance à personne.

translation.en: How do you rid the world of humans?
First, you rid the humans of their humanity.
"When I was a child, I spoke as a child.
translation.fr: Enfant, je parlais comme un enfant.

translation.en: I thought and I reasoned as a child.
translation.fr:
Je pensais et je raisonnais
comme un enfant.

translation.en: But when I became a man,
translation.fr: Mais quand je suis devenu un homme,

translation.en: Those words never meant more to me than they do right now,
translation.fr:
Ces mots n'ont jamais sonné plus juste
qu'aujourd'hui,

translation.en: The best and brightest vision of who we are and what we're fighting for.
translation.fr:
La meilleure version de nous-mêmes
et de notre combat.

translation.en: Our intelligence tells us the Others are readying themselves for a final attack.
translation.fr:
Selon nos renseignements, les Autres
préparent une dernière attaque.

translation.en: What form it will take, we do not know.
translation.fr:
La forme qu'elle prendra,
nous l'ignorons.

translation.en: there will be no more Waves.
translation.fr: il n'y aura plus de Vagues.

translation.en: Humanity as we know it will be wiped from the face of the Earth.
translation.fr:
L'humanité telle que nous la connaissons
disparaîtra de la surface du globe.

translation.en: I'm gonna tell you some things I know.
So with whatever time we have left,
translation.fr: Pendant le temps qu'il nous reste,

translation.en: you will learn to think, speak,
translation.fr:
vous apprendrez à penser,
parler, bouger

translation.en: move and fight like the soldiers you are.
translation.fr:
vous apprendrez à penser,
parler, bouger et combattre comme des soldats.

translation.en: Let the weight of our loss fuel you.
Let the weight of our dead embolden you.
Let the weight of our hope drive you to victory.
translation.fr:
Que notre espoir
vous mène à la victoire.

translation.en: Where's my gun? Where's my gun?
How the hell do you know my name?
You were bleeding on the highway. I brought you back here, to my house.
translation.fr: T'étais en sang, sur la route. Je t'ai ramenée ici, chez moi.

translation.en: All right, when you found me on the highway, I had my gun. Where is it?
translation.fr: J'avais un flingue. Il est où ?

translation.en: -Don't touch me! Don't touch me! Don't... -Your leg. Jesus!
-This is gonna hurt. -All right. Just do it. Just do it.
How long have I been here?
How far is Wright-Patterson from here?
All right, we're not safe anywhere anymore.
translation.fr: On n'est plus en sécurité nulle part.

translation.en: Why did you wanna know how close Wright-Patterson was?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi tu veux savoir
si on est loin de Wright-Patterson ?

translation.en: The Army took him there, so I...
I need to get him back.
You gotta get your strength back.
translation.fr: Faut que tu reprennes des forces.

translation.en: The way everything's happened, I guess it just makes me feel more...
translation.fr:
Vu ce qui s'est passé,
ça m'aide à me sentir plus...

translation.en: And you need help with that?
Don't you tell him my card.
By the way, I heard the new guy coming in got kicked out of their last squad.
translation.fr:
Le nouveau s'est fait virer
de la dernière escouade.

translation.en: I was the leader of my last squad.
So the guy I replace went Section 8. Why?
translation.fr:
Le mec que je remplace a disjoncté.
Pourquoi ?

translation.en: I heard it's 'cause this squad's so bad he was afraid you'd get him killed when the 5th Wave hits.
translation.fr:
L'escouade est si naze qu'il avait peur
de crever à cause de toi.

translation.en: Hey! Keep staring at my ass
and I'll rip your throats out.
I'm not taking orders from you. I'm not gonna die with you geniuses.
translation.fr:
Tu me donnes pas d'ordres.
Je crèverai pas avec vous, les génies.

translation.en: If anyone in this barrack touches me, I'll kill them.
translation.fr: Si quelqu'un me touche, je le tue.

translation.en: I like to play chess. Do you play?
translation.fr:
J'aime bien les échecs.
Tu sais jouer ?

translation.en: But if you wanna play some strip poker later--

translation.fr:
Et pas de remarques sexistes
dégradantes.

translation.en: You had my gun the whole time! Why'd you lie?
translation.fr:
Tu l'avais, mon flingue.
T'as menti !

translation.en: I was afraid you'd shoot me.
translation.fr: J'avais peur que tu me tues.

translation.en: For all I knew, you were an Other.
translation.fr: T'aurais très bien pu être une Autre.
Y en a plein, dans la forêt.

translation.en: They're using those drones to hunt down survivors.

translation.fr: Les points de ralliement, les endroits comme Wright-Patterson,

translation.en: You think that Sammy's already dead?
translation.fr: Tu crois que Sammy est déjà mort ?

translation.en: He's alive, and I'm gonna go get him.
translation.fr: Il est vivant, et je vais le chercher.

translation.en: You're not gonna make it very far on your own.
You know what? Screw you, Evan.
-I don't need you. I don't need anyone. -Cassie, come on. -If you go, I'll just follow you. -Actually, no.
translation.fr:
- J'ai pas besoin de toi.
- Si tu y vas, je te suis.

translation.en: If I need someone to carve a cane for me... You can't stop me. How are you gonna stop me?
translation.fr:
- S'il me faut une canne...
- Comment tu vas m'en empêcher ?

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe I'll shoot you!
What, like you shot that guy with the crucifix?
translation.fr: Comme t'as flingué le mec au crucifix ?

translation.en: -I didn't think you were gonna live. -Don't touch me!
translation.fr:
- Je croyais que t'allais mourir.
- Me touche pas.

translation.en: I can't promise what you'll find, but I will get you there.
translation.fr:
Je garantis pas ce que t'y trouveras,
mais je t'y emmène.

translation.en: This is a waste of time.
Those kids are gonna be dead before their boots hit the ground.
translation.fr:
Ils vont crever
avant d'avoir mis le pied par terre.

translation.en: Especially with you as squad leader.
translation.fr: Surtout si c'est toi, leur chef.

translation.en: You don't know anything about me.
You did good in school, had a bunch of friends. You probably played football.
translation.fr:
T'étais bon élève, t'avais des potes,
tu jouais probablement au football,

translation.en: You might have even been team captain.
And then, all of a sudden, it wasn't.
translation.fr: Et d'un coup, ça l'a plus été.

translation.en: No one to get weak-kneed at that pretty smile.
translation.fr:
Plus de genoux à faire trembler
avec ce joli sourire.

translation.en: You weren't ready for the end of the world.
translation.fr:
T'étais pas prêt
pour la fin du monde.

translation.en: And I was doing fine out there on my own.
translation.fr: Je m'en sortais bien, toute seule,

translation.en: Till they forced me onto their stupid school bus.
We didn't get rescued, dumbass. We got drafted.
translation.fr:
On n'a pas été sauvés, abruti,
on a été mobilisés.

translation.en: you teach us how to shoot.

translation.fr:
Jolie médaille. - Ta meuf ou ta sœur ?
- Ma sœur.

- Ta meuf ou ta sœur ?
- Ma sœur.

translation.en: Can you teach me that thing where you took the gun out of my hand?
translation.fr: Tu m'apprends le truc où... tu m'as pris le flingue des mains ?

translation.en: Let's just leave any potential disarming to me,
translation.fr:
S'il faut désarmer quelqu'un,
je m'en occuperai.

translation.en: -all right? -No. No, I need to be ready.
You don't have to be tough all the time.
translation.fr: T'as pas à être forte tout le temps.

translation.en: I promised Sam that I would be there for him, no matter what.
translation.fr:
J'ai promis à Sam
d'être là pour lui quoi qu'il arrive.

translation.en: I made that promise to him.
translation.fr: Je lui ai donné ma parole.

translation.en: Okay. Grab the barrel of the gun with your left,
translation.fr: Tu le chopes de la main gauche

translation.en: and with your right, snap my hand away.
translation.fr: et avec la droite, tu vires ma main.

translation.en: Hey, you're not gonna hurt me. All right. Like that, but stronger.
translation.fr: Je suis pas en sucre. Pareil, mais plus fort.

translation.en: Now at the end, you'll grab my wrist and pull it toward you.
translation.fr: Et après, tu tires mon poignet vers toi.

translation.en: Okay. Don't be so scared of your weapon.
translation.fr: N'ayez pas peur de votre arme.

translation.en: You gotta think that the gun is a part of you.
Not the gun firing, you firing.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas l'arme qui tire,
c'est vous.

translation.en: Zombie, the Colonel wants to see you, now.
translation.fr: Zombie, le colonel veut te voir.

translation.en: Could be. Seems like a good target.
Simultaneous attacks on the last of our metropolitan areas.
translation.fr:
Des attaques simultanées
sur nos dernières métropoles.

translation.en: A full-on invasion. This is it.
translation.fr: Une invasion totale. On y est.

translation.en: Here, I want to show you something.
These employ the same technology as the detector viewer from medical.
translation.fr:
Ces casques fonctionnent
comme l'appareil de détection.

translation.en: We've improved it. Made it mobile.
The idea is to allow our soldiers in the field to instantly differentiate between friend and foe.
translation.fr:
On voulait que nos soldats
repèrent l'ennemi instantanément.

translation.en: You look at the enemy through this and it lights 'em up green.
translation.fr:
À travers ça,
l'ennemi s'illumine en vert.

translation.en: We can see them before they know they've been seen. We take back the advantage.
translation.fr:
En les voyant à leur insu,
on reprend la main.

translation.en: The only thing left to do now is test the optics in live conditions.
translation.fr:
Il ne reste plus
qu'à le tester sur le terrain.

translation.en: Which is why tomorrow at 2100, I'm sending four squads into battle equipped with these helmets.
translation.fr:
Demain, à 21 h, j'envoie 4 escouades
au combat avec ces casques.

translation.en: Your squad will be among those four.
Bring that squad back in one piece.
Yeah. Actually, you know, she was...
I really wish you hadn't read my journal.
translation.fr:
J'aurais vraiment préféré
que tu lises pas mon journal.

translation.en: I can't wait to meet him.
How do you know without a compass?
You know, I can make one out of a pin and a glass of water.
translation.fr:
je peux en faire une
avec une épingle et un verre d'eau.

translation.en: Didn't peg you for a Girl Scout.
I've never been a huge fan of the outdoors.
translation.fr: J'aime pas trop le grand air.

translation.en: You live on a farm. Accident of birth.
translation.fr:
- T'habites dans une ferme.
- Le hasard de la naissance.

translation.en: I had a scholarship to Kent State.
translation.fr: J'ai eu une bourse pour la fac de Kent.

translation.en: Thought I was some hick? You said it, not me.
translation.fr:
- Tu me prenais pour un péquenaud ?
- C'est toi qui l'as dit.

translation.en: Zombie, are they really sending us to fight?
translation.fr:
Zombie, ils vont vraiment
nous envoyer combattre ?

translation.en: Just go to sleep, all right?
But my sister called me Sams.
Could you guys please shut up?

translation.fr:
- Il est où, Nugget ?
- Intox alimentaire.

translation.en: Infiltrate enemy hornet's nest, verify enemy and terminate.
translation.fr:
Infiltrer le terrain ennemi,
détecter, éliminer.

translation.en: Remember, the Others light up green in your visors.
translation.fr:
N'oubliez pas : les Autres deviennent verts,
là-dedans.

translation.en: At mission complete, signal for extraction.
translation.fr:
En fin de mission,
demandez l'extraction.

translation.en: Holy shit, it's working. You guys, I got two of 'em straight ahead.
translation.fr: Ça marche ! J'en ai deux droit devant.

translation.en: I peed. I definitely just peed.
-They're over here, too! -Run for the alley!
translation.fr:
- Y en a là !
- Allez dans la ruelle.

translation.en: Go! Go, go, go! -Teacup, go, go! -Go! Run!

translation.fr:
- On a perdu Teacup.
- Je suis là.

translation.en: Don't do that! Don't scare me like that!
Down, down! Now, now! Down, down, down! Oompa's been shot!
Don't be dead. Come on, man. Don't be dead! Please don't be dead!
We can't stay here. They'll be back.
That alleyway. We'll have cover there.
translation.fr: La ruelle. On sera à couvert, là-bas.

translation.en: If we're out in the open that long they'll pick us off one by one.
translation.fr: Si on s'expose, ils vont nous éliminer.

translation.en: When I tell you to run, run as fast as you can.
On my go, haul ass to the alleyway.
translation.fr: À mon signal, foncez dans la ruelle.

translation.en: Back out there? Are you crazy?
Listen, Teacup, you just gotta trust me, okay? You're gonna run and don't look back.
translation.fr:
Fais-moi confiance.
Cours sans te retourner.

translation.en: -What about Oompa? -He's dead, man. We gotta leave him.
translation.fr:
- Et Oompa ?
- Il est mort. On le laisse là.

translation.en: I'd hug you if I didn't think you'd punch me in the nuts for it.
translation.fr:
Je t'embrasserais,
mais je tiens à mes couilles.

translation.en: Okay, so what do we do now?
They knock planes out of the sky and cause earthquakes, but they're afraid of an army of children?
translation.fr:
Ils provoquent des crashs et des séismes
et on leur fait peur ?

translation.en: There's something Vosch isn't telling us.
Okay, I'm not risking my life for this.
translation.fr: Je risque pas ma vie pour ça.

translation.en: I'm better out there on my own.
If you know what's best for you, you'll do the same.
-Holy shit! What the hell is this? -Zombie, you see this? -She's green! -What the hell, you guys?
translation.fr:
- Elle est verte !
- Ça va pas ?

translation.en: You're one of them! You're an alien!
translation.fr: T'es avec Eux. T'es un alien !

translation.en: What are you talking about? I just saved your asses!
translation.fr: Quoi ? Je viens de vous sauver !

translation.en: If she's one of them, we have to take her out now.
Poundcake, just calm down, all right?
I can see it inside of her!
translation.fr: Je le vois dans sa tête.

- Y a rien dans ma tête.
- Ta gueule !

translation.en: -Zombie, what do we do? Do we shoot her? -It's your call, Zombie.
translation.fr:
- On la tue ?
- Tu nous dis, Zombie.

translation.en: -Oh, my God! What's going on, man? -Come on, man.
Hey. Put your guns down. Put your guns down.
Don't shoot. Calm down. She's not an Other. Neither am I.
translation.fr: Tirez pas. On n'est pas avec Eux.

translation.en: Come on, Dumbo. You know who I am. Put the guns down.
translation.fr: Tu me connais, Dumbo. Baissez vos armes.

translation.en: Just put 'em down! I'm not an Other.
translation.fr:
Baissez-les ! Je suis pas un Autre.
Et les autres dehors, non plus.

translation.en: I don't even think any of those people out there shooting at us are Others.
translation.fr:
Je suis pas un Autre.
Et les autres dehors, non plus.

translation.en: They lied to us. They lied to us, man.
Green doesn't mean alien. Green means human.
Those lenses, these trackers, it's all fake, man.
translation.fr: Ces lentilles, ces traceurs... c'est du bidon.

translation.en: It's an illusion. It's a trick.
They weren't testing these. They were testing us.
They were seeing how we would do, how we would hold up under pressure.
translation.fr:
Notre réactivité,
notre résistance sous pression.

translation.en: All right? If we would do what we were trained to do.
-To kill Others! -No, to kill the survivors, man!
translation.fr: Tuer des Autres. Non, tuer les survivants !

translation.en: Well, what about the guys outside, the ones that were shooting at us?
translation.fr: Et les mecs qui nous tiraient dessus ?

translation.en: Why would the Army want us to kill other humans?
And because we're kids, they thought they could manipulate us into doing their dirty work.
translation.fr:
Comme on est jeunes, ils nous ont
manipulés pour qu'on fasse le sale boulot.
On ne combat pas la 5e Vague.

translation.en: This means we can't go back. You know that, right?
I left him back at the base.
translation.fr: Je l'ai laissé à la base.
Je voulais le protéger. Oh non...

translation.en: -No, man. I gotta go back. -You can't just wander back in there.
translation.fr:
- J'ai pas le choix.
- N'y va pas...

translation.en: I'll put the tracker back in. They'll pick me up.
You guys go ahead. I will meet up with you later.
Dumbo, where can I take a bullet in the torso and not die?
translation.fr:
Dumbo, je peux prendre
une balle dans le torse sans mourir ?

translation.en: Where can I take a bullet in the torso? I gotta make it look real. It's the only way I'm getting back in alive.
translation.fr:
Il me faut une blessure réaliste
au torse, sinon ils me tueront.

translation.en: It's impossible, man. There's too many organs.
translation.fr: C'est impossible. Y a trop d'organes.

translation.en: Ringer, she can make the shot, all right? I know she can.
translation.fr: Ringer peut me tirer dessus, j'en suis sûr.

translation.en: You want me to shoot you? Don't pretend like you haven't thought about it.
translation.fr:
- Que je te tire dessus ?
- T'en rêves.

translation.en: Where do you want me to shoot him?
You're out of your drone sector.
translation.fr: Vous êtes sorti de votre secteur.

translation.en: Put the gun down. Stay away.
If I was gonna kill you, Cassie, I would've done it a long time ago.
translation.fr:
Si je voulais te tuer,
ce serait déjà fait.

translation.en: You're one of them. You're a fucking Other.
translation.fr: T'es avec Eux, t'es un Autre !

translation.en: This isn't the first time the Others have been here.
translation.fr: Les Autres sont déjà venus ici.

translation.en: They came before and created sleeper agents, like me.
translation.fr:
Ils ont créé des agents dormants
comme moi.
Je me suis toujours senti différent.

translation.en: Growing up, there was this voice in my head.
translation.fr: Gamin, j'avais une voix dans la tête.

translation.en: It was quiet, but it was there.
translation.fr: Elle se taisait, mais elle était là.
Et quand le vaisseau est arrivé,

translation.en: it was like a switch was flipped inside me,
translation.fr:
c'est comme si un interrupteur
avait basculé, en moi.

translation.en: How many people have you killed?
translation.fr: Tu as tué combien de gens ?

translation.en: The disease that the Others created. The disease that you created.
translation.fr:
Cette maladie, ce sont les Autres
qui l'ont créée. C'est toi !

translation.en: Our kind believe that love is just a trick.
translation.fr:
Pour nous,
l'amour n'est qu'une illusion.

translation.en: A way to protect your genetic future.

translation.fr: je ne comprends pas pourquoi, mais...

translation.en: It was like you flipped the switch back.
translation.fr: tu as remis l'interrupteur à sa place.

translation.en: You made me wanna be human again.
translation.fr:
Tu m'as donné envie
de redevenir humain.

translation.en: Love's not a trick. It's real.
I know now because of you.
translation.fr: Je le sais, maintenant, grâce à toi.

translation.en: I don't wanna hear any more.
Cassie, please, just let me help you.
All I wanna do is help you find Sam.
translation.fr: Je veux t'aider à retrouver Sam.

translation.en: All right. Get on your knees, Evan.
All right. Come on, just get on your knees.
The Army is controlled by the Others.
translation.fr: L'armée est aux mains des Autres.
Tango 3, on rentre à la base !

translation.en: The rest of the squad are reported KIA.
translation.fr: Les autres sont morts au combat.

translation.en: Ma'am, it's all right. It's all right. We've got you.
Any family not known to be dead?
translation.fr: De la famille encore en vie ?
Non, il n'y a plus que moi.

translation.en: You know why you're here, Cassie?
translation.fr: Tu sais pourquoi tu es là ?

translation.en: We tried to move to cover, but as soon as we did...
translation.fr: Dès qu'on a voulu se mettre à couvert...

- Ils sont tous morts.
- Sauf toi.

translation.en: -I took a bullet, sir. -But you survived.
translation.fr: J'ai pris une balle. Mais tu as survécu.

translation.en: the way that bullet went right through you and managed to...
translation.fr: que la balle t'ait traversé sans...

translation.en: You drop your lie, and I'll drop mine.
translation.fr: Tu arrêtes de mentir, j'arrête aussi.
Je sais ce que vous êtes.

translation.en: You're gonna kill me, aren't you?
What's the point of any of this?
translation.fr: C'est quoi, le but de tout ça ?

- On a fait quoi pour mériter...
- Rien.

translation.en: Other than occupy a space we need.
translation.fr:
Mais vous occupez
l'espace qu'il nous faut.

translation.en: We're not that different, Ben. Your kind would do exactly the same thing.
translation.fr:
On n'est pas si différents.
Tes semblables feraient la même chose.

translation.en: Our kind wouldn't have wiped out an entire species.
translation.fr:
Nos semblables n'auraient pas éliminé
une espèce entière.

translation.en: Of course you would. You've been doing it for centuries.
translation.fr:
Bien sûr que si.
Ils le font depuis des siècles.

translation.en: There's more. Three guards were killed at the west gate...
translation.fr: Et trois gardes ont été tués...

translation.en: An explosion, sir. It came from inside the base.
-Get rid of him. -Damage to Sector Three!
We need to move all the recruits off-base.
Get 'em on planes to Wonderland now.
Deploy units. Find out who's attacking us.

translation.fr: Couloir sud ! Au pas de course !

translation.en: They're taking out our security cameras.
translation.fr: Ils détruisent les caméras de sécurité.

translation.en: Bring the drones home so we can see who's attacking us.
translation.fr:
Ramenez les drones,
qu'on voie qui nous attaque.

translation.en: -Don't move! Don't move! -It's okay! Okay, all right!
Cassie? My name's Ben Parish. We used to go to high school together.
I'm looking for my brother, Sam.
-You know my brother? -Yes, we're in the same squad.
translation.fr:
- Tu le connais ?
- Il est dans mon escouade.

translation.en: -You know where he is? -I'm trying to get to him.
translation.fr:
- Tu sais où il est ?
- Je vais le chercher.

translation.en: All recruits report to the transport area.
translation.fr:
Les recrues sont attendues
en zone de transport.

translation.en: They're sending the kids off to war.

translation.fr: Vosch. L'armée. Ce sont des Autres.

translation.en: Look, Sam is about to get on one of those planes.
translation.fr: Sam va embarquer dans un avion.

translation.en: If we don't go now, you're not gonna see him again. You understand?
translation.fr:
Faut y aller,
ou tu le reverras plus.

translation.en: -Recruits report to the transport area. -All right.
Once the recruits reach Wonderland, get them ready for immediate deployment.
translation.fr:
À Wonderland,
préparez les recrues à être déployées.
La zone de transport est par là.

translation.en: Hey! This is a restricted area.
No, it's fine. He's one of us. It's okay.
translation.fr: Il est avec nous, c'est bon.

translation.en: Evan, what are you doing here?
I told you not to follow me. Well, I decided to ignore you.
translation.fr:
- Je t'ai dit de pas me suivre.
- J'ai désobéi.

translation.en: In about ten minutes, when the last plane full of kids takes off,
translation.fr:
Dans 10 mn, quand le dernier avion
de gamins décollera,

translation.en: I'm taking this place down, for good.
translation.fr: je rase cet endroit pour de bon.

translation.en: I'm sorry I lied to you, Cassie.
translation.fr: Je suis désolé de t'avoir menti.

translation.en: I was wrong when I said I was both one of you and one of them.
translation.fr:
J'avais tort quand j'ai dit
que j'étais avec toi et avec Eux.

translation.en: You can't be both. You have to choose.
translation.fr:
On ne peut pas être les deux.
Il faut choisir.

translation.en: I think Evan Walker's about to blow this place up.
translation.fr: Evan Walker va tout faire sauter.
Restez avec votre chef de groupe.

translation.en: in a calm and orderly fashion.

translation.fr: Restez avec vos chefs de groupe.

translation.en: -Stay with your group leader. -Keep it moving.
translation.fr: Restez avec vos chefs de groupe.

translation.en: Once you are on the plane, you will receive further instructions.
translation.fr:
Une fois dans l'avion,
nous vous tiendrons informés.

translation.en: I missed you so much, Sam.
Look what I brought back for you.
translation.fr: Regarde ce que je te rapporte.

translation.en: I gotta take his tracker out.
All right? It's not gonna hurt, okay?
All the recruits accounted for? Yes, sir. Six barracks left.
translation.fr:
- Toutes les recrues sont là ?
- Oui. Encore 6 groupes.

translation.en: Power up my bird. Last plane's in the air, evacuate the base.
translation.fr:
Démarrez mon hélico.
Après le dernier avion, évacuez la base.

translation.en: Run, run! Go for the truck.
-Quick, Sammy. Get in! -All right, come on! Get in! Get in!
Make sure you give her the food first. Let me know if it starts hurting or anything like that.
translation.fr:
- Nourrissez-la en premier.
- Dis-moi si t'as mal.

translation.en: It's a little early, isn't it?
translation.fr: Il est un peu tôt, non ?

translation.en: You were named after a star, right?
translation.fr: Ton nom vient bien d'une étoile ?

translation.en: I was named after Ben & Jerry's.
translation.fr: Moi, ça vient de Ben & Jerry's.

translation.en: Nothing made my dad happier than ice cream.
I'm sure you made him happier.
We have to save those other kids.
translation.fr: Il faut sauver tous les autres.

translation.en: How are we gonna do that?
and just go get something to eat.
Come on, lazy bones. Put your bear down, would you?
The Others see our hope as a weakness,
translation.fr:
Pour les Autres,
notre espoir est une faiblesse,

translation.en: It's our hope that lets us survive.
translation.fr:
C'est notre espoir
qui nous maintient en vie.

translation.en: That lets us bend, but remain unbroken.
translation.fr: Qui nous permet de plier sans rompre.

translation.en: -You two knew each other? -Yeah, we went to high school together.
translation.fr:
- Vous vous connaissez ?
- Oui, du lycée.

translation.en: It's our hope that will let us win one day.
translation.fr:
C'est notre espoir
qui nous mènera à la victoire.

translation.en: It's our hope that makes us human.
translation.fr:
C'est notre espoir
qui nous rend humains.
